0001: Korean vowel names are the same as the sound they make.
0002: Vowels can never be alone - they must have a paired consonant.
0003: A consonant by itself will have ã…¡ appended to it.
0004:
The four allowed consonant-vowel combinations in Batchim are CV, C
V, CV
V, C
V
C
0005: Common pronunciation schemes include: Revised Rominzation (RR), McCune-Reischaur (MCCR), and IPA.
